title: How to upgrade to new client?
body: I can't seem to figure out how to update my client. It says that there should be a pop-up when I open the client, but I see no such pop-up. Is it even possible?

replies.body:
When you launch the client to the old client launcher, there should be a "League Client Update Open Beta" news card in the upper right hand corner.  You can click that at any time to start the upgrade.

Please let me know if you need any other assistance :)
